title: I cannot buy a champion with IP
body:
I have 5k IP draven is 4800 and I cannot buy it! I logged out and so on. Still no buy!!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: I got it after I earned 5200... Is it a bug or something?

I took a look at your IP balance history and it looks like this was a display bug which showed your IP to be a few hundred more than it actually was. The currency display has been known to lag in the past (showing values higher or lower than they actually are) but usually a re-log fixes the issue. Let me know if you think you're still seeing an incorrect amount of IP.
